modShortDescription: This mod reworks the way concrete is created. It never made sense to Donovan why you had to smelt stone to make cement mix, so he fixed that.
modDescription:
This mod reworks the way concrete is created. It never made sense to Donovan why you had to smelt stone to make [cement](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-building-materials/) mix, so he fixed that.

* The forge no longer creates cement mix, insteadâ€¦
* Craft cement mix directly in the cement mixer with equal parts of sand and clay.
* Concrete no longer requires sand, just cement mix and small rocks.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-bettercement)**

If you find any issues or have a suggestion for improvement, please [open an issue](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues) and Donovan will look into it ASAP.

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
